mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.jfwz AS "jfwz", a.jfbh AS "jfbh", a.jfjj AS "jfjj", a.jfxctp AS "jfxctp", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.kzzd1 AS "kzzd1", a.kzzd2 AS "kzzd2", a.kzzd3 AS "kzzd3", a.kzzd4 AS "kzzd4"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM jf_xx a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.jfjj LIKE '%'||#{jfjj}||'%' '%'+#{jfjj}+'%' concat('%',#{jfjj},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
limit ${limit},10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jf_xx( id, name, jfwz, jfbh, jfjj, jfxctp, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, kzzd1, kzzd2, kzzd3, kzzd4 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{jfwz}, #{jfbh}, #{jfjj}, #{jfxctp}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{kzzd1}, #{kzzd2}, #{kzzd3}, #{kzzd4} )
